article: When you hear about trees cut for paper , you might think of your favorite trees in the backyard , nearby parks or wild forests being cut to pieces . the good news is that production and use of paper will not cause forests to disappear . Most trees used for paper come from timberlands . People plant trees here for use . It usually takes 10 to 20 years for trees to grow big enough to be cut down . During _ , trees provide a home for animals and produce oxygen for the earth . And after people cut down the big trees , they plant small ones again . Often , a tree is not cut down for making paper at all . People use the big part for buildings . Paper is then made from the left small part . We also recycle paper - - People collect used paper and turn it into new products , likes boxes , newsprint and writing paper , in the factory . So it ' s important for us to recycle paper and reduce the amount of it in landfills . , , A , B , C , D , . ( 2 , 10 )
